title: Gov. launches 'Stay Home, Save Lives' ad campaign amid virus
description: SALEM, Ore. (AP) — Oregon Gov. Kate Brown launched a statewide public awareness campaign Saturday with Portland-based ad agency Wieden+Kennedy, the Oregon Health Authority and others to inform Oregonians about the importance of staying home to save lives duri…
